text: 18.2: Ro 16.3; 1 Ko 16.19; 2 T 4.19Por Korinan ŋgu bakɨmen vugap, ana maam Zuda guma mben hɨgi. Mba guma zɨ, Akuira. Akuira ŋgu nɨɨŋge khare, ana Pontus ŋgu bakɨme fhaiŋ guma ma. Ana won muuŋ Prisiran kov, mani maneŋ fhumra Itari fhaiŋ thav wani zɨgi. Mani khaŋ muuŋgiap, Sisar Krodius fhum khaŋ Zudaiŋ ga nzuai, “Nde Rom ŋgu bakɨme thav wari ŋgɨp harigi ŋguir kɨri.” Mani maaŋ muuŋgiap zav, Korinan ki. Mani maaŋ kim, Por vov, manin hɨgi.
